name: ListSystemEvents
description:
Retrieve a list of all system events.

Use this tool to list all events that have occurred in the system. It supports pagination through the `cursor` parameter.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: String to paginate through the results of the event list.

value_schema.description: The cursor to paginate through the results

parameters.name: results_limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of event results to return. This should be a positive integer.

value_schema.description: The number of results to return

parameters.name: event_types_filter
parameters.description: Specify an array of event types to filter the results by. Each type should be a string.

value_schema.description: The types of events to filter by

parameters.name: filter_created_before
parameters.description: Filter events created before or at this timestamp (inclusive). Must be a valid ISO 8601 datetime string in UTC.

value_schema.description: Filter events created before or at this timestamp (inclusive). Must be a valid ISO 8601 datetime string. All times are in UTC.

parameters.name: filter_events_created_after
parameters.description: Filter events created after or at this timestamp. Use a valid ISO 8601 datetime string in UTC.

value_schema.description: Filter events created after or at this timestamp (inclusive). Must be a valid ISO 8601 datetime string. All times are in UTC.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the exa_search API.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The cursor to paginate through the results

value_schema.description: The cursor to paginate through the results

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results to return

value_schema.description: The number of results to return

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: The types of events to filter by

value_schema.description: The types of events to filter by

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Filter events created before or at this timestamp (inclusive). Must be a valid ISO 8601 datetime string. All times are in UTC.

value_schema.description: Filter events created before or at this timestamp (inclusive). Must be a valid ISO 8601 datetime string. All times are in UTC.

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description: Filter events created after or at this timestamp (inclusive). Must be a valid ISO 8601 datetime string. All times are in UTC.

value_schema.description: Filter events created after or at this timestamp (inclusive). Must be a valid ISO 8601 datetime string. All times are in UTC.
